function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 outbreak leading to increased pressure on healthcare system and staff","Impact":"Healthcare staff under enormous pressure, challenges for professionals, negative impacts on healthcare system","Mitigation":"Implement strict infection control measures, provide adequate resources and support for healthcare professionals","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, air filtration technology, contactless technology for building controls","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients, general public","Owner":"Healthcare authorities, government, facility management"},{"Description":"Lack of proper indoor air quality and thermal comfort in healthcare buildings","Impact":"Negative impact on patient well-being and recovery, increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Improve ventilation systems, maintain optimal indoor air quality, regulate thermal comfort","Technologies":"Smart HVAC systems, air quality sensors, building automation and control systems","People":"Patients, healthcare staff, visitors","Owner":"Facility management, building engineers, healthcare authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate building automation and control systems (BACS) in healthcare sector","Impact":"Inefficient energy use, discomfort for occupants, compromised infection control measures","Mitigation":"Upgrade BACS for energy efficiency, improve indoor air quality, enhance infection control measures","Technologies":"BACS assessment tools, smart building automation systems, energy management software","People":"Occupants, healthcare staff, facility management","Owner":"Facility management, building engineers, healthcare authorities"}]}
